meanings.definition: A room furnished and used for sleeping.
meanings.sent1: My sister and I share a cozy bedrooms with bunk beds.
meanings.sent2: The new house has three bedrooms, perfect for our family of five.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally walked into the wrong bedrooms and found myself in a room full of toys!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a maze of bedrooms, each holding memories of a different chapter in her life.
meanings.sent5: The bedrooms were painted in vibrant colors, making them feel warm and inviting.

meanings.definition: The number of bedrooms in a house.
meanings.sent1: The real estate listing mentioned that the house had four bedrooms and two bathrooms.
meanings.sent2: We decided to buy the house with more bedrooms so each of our kids could have their own space.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the most bedrooms in a house was fierce among the siblings.
meanings.sent4: The bedrooms in the mansion seemed to stretch on forever, a symbol of the owner's wealth.
meanings.sent5: The value of the property increased significantly due to the addition of extra bedrooms.
